Package imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear

Class Translation2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear.LinearMapping2D
      • imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear.ProjectiveMapping2D
        • imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear.AffineMapping2D
          • imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear.Translation2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Mapping2D, java.lang.Cloneable
    public class Translation2D
extends AffineMapping2D
    This class represents a pure 2D translation (as a special case of affine transformation). Instances are immutable and it can be assumed that every instance of this class is indeed a translation.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the concatenated translations

      • getInverse

        public Translation2D getInverse()
        Description copied from class: AffineMapping2D
        Calculates and returns the inverse mapping. Note that the inverse A' of a projective transformation matrix A is again a linear transformation but its a'2' element is generally not 1. Scaling A' to A'' = A' / a22' yields a projective transformation that reverses A. While A * A' = I, the result of A * A'' is a scaled identity matrix. Note that inverting an affine transformation always yields another affine transformation.
        Specified by:
        getInverse in interface Mapping2D
        Overrides:
        getInverse in class AffineMapping2D
        Returns:
        the inverse projective transformation

      • getJacobian

        public double[][] getJacobian​(Pnt2d xy)
        Description copied from interface: Mapping2D
        Returns the Jacobian matrix for this mapping, evaluated at the given 2D point. This method is only implemented for selected mappings.
        Specified by:
        getJacobian in interface Mapping2D
        Overrides:
        getJacobian in class AffineMapping2D
        Parameters:
        xy - the 2D position to calculate the Jacobian for
        Returns:
        the Jacobian matrix
